questions.question: Which platforms can I connect?
questions.answer: StockSync integrates with Shopify, WooCommerce, Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Walmart Marketplace, and many other e-commerce platforms. You can manage all your inventory from one place.

questions.question: How does demand forecasting work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes your historical sales data, seasonal trends, and current velocity to predict when products will run out. This helps you reorder at the optimal time and avoid stockouts.

questions.question: What happens if I sell out on one platform?
questions.answer: StockSync instantly updates inventory across all connected platforms within seconds of a sale, preventing overselling and ensuring customers only see accurate stock availability.
